description.ar:
“مرحبًا ، عليك مساعدتي.” “ما الذي يمكنني مساعدتك به؟” “أريد أن أصبح إمبراطورًا.” … ماذا؟ ” ···ماذا او ما؟ عار العائلة الإمبراطورية ، كلاب الشمال المجنونة ، الطغاة في ساحة المعركة. كيف أجعل عقلي أكثر قوة؟ “يجب أن تجد طريقة لتجعلني إمبراطورًا ، وإلا فإنك ستموت فقط.” تمسكها بمهمة نجاة مع احتمال رهيبة للنجاح ، وتريد البقاء على قيد الحياة بأمان! تحويل الفوضى الإمبراطورية إلى إمبراطور! أنت تعلم أنني يجب أن أعمل بدلاً من المواعدة ، أليس كذلك؟ أيمكنك سماعي معك هكذا ، قلبي ينبض مثل طفل مجنون. إنه أثر جانبي سام ، أليس كذلك؟ “” وعندما أراك ، تستمر هذه الأيدي المجنونة في الارتعاش. أريد أن ألمسك بهذا الشكل ، لكن يدي ريكسيد ترتعشان. شعرت به وهو يمسك بقبضتيه. “أخشى أن يساء فهمك ، لكنني لا أعني أنني أريد أن أتأوه بجسدك.” “أه نعم.”

---
المحتالة العبقرية "فايبر" ، مجدفة الموت التي قلبت الإمبراطورية ، اقتربت من طاغية ساحة المعركة الدوق الأكبر هيسن ، ذات يوم. "مرحبا ، عليك مساعدتي قليلاً." "كيف يمكنني مساعدك؟" "سأحاول مواجهة الإمبراطور." "....ماذا او ما؟" ".... حسنا؟" العار الإمبراطوري ، كلب الشمال المجنون ، طاغية ساحة المعركة. عندما يتكون دماغه من عضلات ، ما الذي يمكن فعله؟ "يجب أن تجد طريقة لتجعلني إمبراطورة خلاف ذلك ، إنه مجرد موت ". تم القبض عليها من خلال شغفها بالبقاء على قيد الحياة ، وكل هذا يعتمد على احتمالية نجاح مهمة البقاء القصوى هذه! دعونا نحول هذا الوغد الملكي إلى إمبراطور! كما تعلم ... نحن نعمل ، لا نتواعد ، أليس كذلك؟ "هل تسمع هذا؟ قلبي ينبض مثل لقيطة مجنونة عندما أكون معك. إنه من الآثار الجانبية السامة أليس كذلك؟ " "....." "وعندما أراك ، يتأرجح هذا الرسغ المجنون أيضًا. أعتقد أنه يريد أن ألمسك بهذا الشكل ". اهتزت يد ريكسيد على ظهرها. شعرت بقبضته مشدودة. "في حال أسأت الفهم ، أقول لك ، لا أقصد الرغبة في التحرش بك." "أن نعم.

---

description.en:
Rexid van Hexen, prince of the Hexen Empire and feared defender of the border, wants to become emperor. But because his brain doesn't even come close to his brawn, he enlists the help of the "Viper," a notorious swindler and master of disguise. With her life on the line, the Viper must now pull off her greatest scam while posing as... Rexid's heiress? Will the unlikely duo succeed, or will they end up being deceived themselves?

---
A genius of disguise. A master of escape. One day, Grand Duke Hexen, the Tyrant of the Battlefield, came to see the genius swindler and death-row prisoner, 'Viper,' who stirred up the Empire.

"Hey, you need to help me."

"How can I help you?"

"I need to try becoming the emperor once in my life."

"...Huh?"

'...You?' The *Imperial Family's Disgrace*, *Crazy Northern Dog*, and *Tyrant of the Battlefield*. What can I do to help someone when even their brain is made of muscle?

"You must find a way for me to become the emperor. Or else you'll be put to death."

A chance given to her who wants to survive. A survival mission with an abysmal success rate! Make the black sheep of the imperial family into the emperor! We... You know that we have to work rather than have some romance, right?

"Can you hear it? My heart started beating like a crazy person's since you stuck to me like this. It's a side effect of the poison, right?"

"..."

"And when I see you, this crazy wrist keeps twitching. I think it wants to... touch you just like this..."

Rexid's hand which touched my back trembled. It felt like he was clenching his fists tightly, "I'm saying it just incase you misunderstood, but that doesn't mean I want to grope your body."

"Ah, yes."

---

description.fr:
Dans sa vie précédente, Viper était une arnaqueuse de génie utilisant son cerveau pour monter dans la hiérarchie et obtenir ce qu'elle voulait jusqu'à ce qu'elle se fasse prendre à son propre jeu et assassiner.

Viper, maintenant réincarnée dans le corps d'une orpheline a accepté sa mort et a décidé de ne plus vivre dans l'escroquerie. Elle se fait délibérément arrêter et enfermer au camp pour criminels de Drax. C'est la veille de son évasion, qu'elle reçoit dans sa cellule la visite de Rexid Van Hessen, le troisième prince de l'empire qui après avoir entendu les rumeurs selon lesquelles elle serait très intelligente décide de lui demander de l'aide afin qu'il devienne empereur.

Malgré que le nombre de candidats avant lui pouvant accéder au trône ne soit que de deux, la nature de Rexid à agir sans réfléchir et à être violent et agressif sans se préoccuper des lois l'envoie dans les terres du Nord pour combattre.

Si elle ne veut pas être exécutée et bénéficier d'une belle vie sans difficulté d'être soignée, nourrit ou logée, Viper doit accepter d'aider Rexid à devenir empereur, et puisqu'elle n'a rien pas le choix, la femme accepte même si pour elle cet homme qui malgré la possession d'un cerveau ne s'en sert pas ne pourra jamais gouverner l'empire.

---

description.en:
I’ve transmigrated into the body of the wife of the mad villain emperor in an angsty novel!
How will I escape? By running away quietly when the saintess he’ll become obsessed with appears.

This love-blind emperor won’t even remember that I exist once he lays eyes on the saintess! I really didn’t do anything. All I did was lay as low as I could so that I wouldn’t get on my crazy husband’s nerves…. But the villain emperor has asked me to return to the palace with him, and not the saintess. But she’s already here! Why are you obessessing over me?

altTitles.ja: 公爵家のSランク神器使いの回帰

altTitles.ja-ro: Koushakuka no S-Rank Jingi Tsukai no Kaiki

description.en: “A work of the popular unparalleled battle fantasy genre”. There exists weapons known as “Divine arms” that are the manifestation of one’s own soul. Our protagonist Bell was born in a famous Paladin family, but is the only member unable to manifest a divine armament and gets banished. But then he inherits the legendary divine armament “Avalon” and becomes as strong as an S-rank paladin. Bell returned to his family home to save his little sister, but ends up being killed by someone. He returns to his youth alongside Avalon. Now that he has the legendary divine armament “Avalon” with him, his real life begins.

title.en: I Raised a Nine Tailed Fox Wrongly

altTitles.es-la: Malcrié a un zorro de nueve colas

description.en:
One day, I met a spirit. And it wasn't just anyone, but a gumiho puppy. As I worried about the little one's fate, I met a priestess from the eastern continent, who told me to raise him until he reached maturity and then send him back home. Raising a little fox...

How could a cursed human welcome and care for a young life? It was strange and scary, but I couldn't refuse.

The fox, Ran, was just adorable. So, with much love and care, I raised him... But when he grew up, he became as seductive as I've heard of his kind, and he refused to be independent. All the training he had given seemed to have been in vain, with that lewd look.

"You can’t run away."
"Keep being good and help me, Scyllia. By my side."

Forever...

description.de:
Nach einem Leben voller Blutvergießen und Kummer wird die große Kaiserin Martina wiedergeboren als Astina, geniale Tochter eines bescheidenen Grafen. Aber ihre friedliche Welt zerbricht, als der Bankrott der Familie ihren Vater dazu zwingt, sie an den gefährlichen Erzherzog Atalenta zu verheiraten. Dieser ist in der feinen Gesellschaft bekannt als „Terriod die Bestie“, weil er durch einen Familienfluch in ein wildes Monster verwandelt wurde. Glücklicherweise ist selbst die tödliche Bestie von Atalenta dem mächtigen Schwert der ehemaligen Kaiserin nicht gewachsen. Alle sind geschockt, als die neue Erzherzogin ihren Ehemann kurzerhand zähmt und zum Familienoberhaupt wird. Niemand ist jedoch mehr überrascht als Astina selbst, als ein einfacher Kuss Terriod zurück in einen Menschen verwandelt. Er ähnelt nicht nur ihrem Liebhaber aus ihrem vergangenen Leben, sondern hat auch noch keinerlei Erinnerungen an sie von seiner Zeit als Bestie. Kann sich dieses mächtige Paar trotz der unangenehmen Umstände zusammentun und über das Erzherzogtum herrschen?

---

description.en:
100 years after her death, Empress Martina, the founder of the Carabella Empire, reincarnates as Astina Lette, the daughter of a count. Her peaceful, everyday life as a noble lady, a stark contrast to her past life, is short-lived, however.

With the bankruptcy of her father's failed trade business, her family falls into great debt. Astina decides to sell herself off to marry Grand Duke Thereode in place of her sister Kanna to save her family from their financial crisis. But Thereode is forever cursed to take on the form of a beast, and no one expects her to survive the night with him…

Still, defying all odds, she fights the beast with her impressive swordsmanship, and miraculously survives. Over time, a slow relationship begins to kindle between them as she tames him as her pet.

---
Following a life of bloodshed and heartbreak, the great Empress Martina is reborn as Astina, the genius daughter of a humble count. But her peaceful world is shattered when bankruptcy forces her father to marry her off to the dangerous Archduke Atalenta. All of high society knows him as "Theriod the Beast" because of a family curse that turned him into a wild monster. Luckily, even the deadly beast of Atalenta is no match for the former empress's mighty sword. 

Everyone is shocked when the new archduchess tames her husband all too easily and takes over as the family head. No one's more surprised than Astina, however, when her casual kiss returns Theriod to his human form. Not only does he resemble her past life lover, but he has no memory of her from his wolf days. Despite these awkward circumstances, can the new power couple join hands to rule over the archduchy?

---

description.fr:
Après une vie ponctuée de massacres et de trahisons, l'impératrice Martina se réincarne dans le corps d'Astina, de longues années plus tard. Seulement, cette fois aussi, sa vie ne sera pas de tout repos, puisqu'après que leur père a fait faillite, la sœur d'Astina est mariée de force à l'archiduc Atalenta, un homme victime d'une terrible malédiction le transformant en monstre. Astina décide alors de prendre la place de la jeune Kanna, et affronte sans mal la bête terrifiante qu'est devenu l'archiduc. Elle n'en reste pas moins surprise d'arriver à gérer la situation avec tant de facilité, et l'est encore plus lorsqu'un simple baiser de sa part finit par rendre son apparence à l'archiduc, qui en plus de ressembler étrangement à l'homme donc Martina était amoureuse, n'a plus aucun souvenir d'elle lorsqu'il était un loup. Malgré cette situation on ne peut plus étrange, vont-ils réussir à maintenir l'ordre dans le duché et à régner main dans la main?

---

description.ko:
제국의 시조였던 전설적인 인물 마티나의 죽음으로부터 백 년 후,
마티나는 귀족가의 일개 여식인 아스티나로 환생한다.

전생과 다른 평화로운 일상은 잠시,
아버지의 파산으로 인해 아스티나는
야수의 형상을 한 테리오드 대공에게로 팔려 간다.

“급소를 쳐서 기절시켰어요.”
“기…… 절시키셨다고요?”

하룻밤에 죽어 나갈 것이라는 모두의 예상과 달리
그녀는 화려한 검술로 괴물 테리오드를 제압해
애완동물로 길들이기 시작한다.

“테오, 앉아.”
“컹!”

달빛이 아름다운 어느 밤,
자신을 잘 따르는 테리오드가 기특해
아스티나는 그에게 짧게 입을 맞춰 주는데……

“……테오?”

아스티나의 애완동물이……
사람이 됐다?

결핍된 괴물 남편과 무심한 아내의 본격 조련 로맨스!

description.ru:
Спустя сотню лет после смерти Мартины — основательницы империи, легенда переродилась в теле Астины — одной из дочерей аристократической семьи. Ее мирная повседневная жизнь, так отличавшаяся от предыдущей, оборвалась в тот миг, когда обанкротившийся отец продал ее звероподобному эрцгерцогу Териоту. Но вопреки многочисленным ожиданиям, что девушка, встретившись с чудовищем, в одночасье погибнет, благодаря своему исключительному мастерству владения мечом Астина победила монстра и приручила его, словно домашнего питомца…

description.uk:
Через 100 років після смерті, імператриця Мартіна, засновниця імперії Карабелла, перевтілюється в Астіну Летте, дочку графа. Однак її мирне повсякденне життя благородної дами, що різко контрастує з її минулим життям, є недовгим.

Після банкрутства невдалого торгового бізнесу її батька, її родина потрапляє у великі борги. Астіна вирішує продати себе, щоб вийти заміж за великого герцога Тереоду, замість своєї сестри Канни, щоб врятувати свою сім'ю від фінансової кризи. Але Тереода назавжди проклятий мати образ звіра, і ніхто не очікує, що вона переживе ніч з ним...

description.en:
Ji-woo transfers to a rural school with his parents who have returned to farming. The fresh air, the relaxed atmosphere... he liked them all. However, for a moment that seemed like a pleasant start,

Ji-woo discovers that the flower garden that he has carefully cared for has been messed up.. Ji-woo, who thought it was someone's territoriality, suspects Dongchan, who was particularly harsh to him at school.
First off, that bangs! I'll start with those bangs that make it impossible to know what you're thinking!!
description.fr: La vie à la campagne est censée être idyllique, non ? Un endroit paisible rempli d'aimables voisins au grand cœur, pas vrai ? C'est ce que Jiwoo attend avec impatience... Mais de tous les voisins qu'il aurait pu avoir, c'est Dongchan qu'il est le sien. Froid, distant et insondable, Dongchan n'est pas le plus accueillant du voisinage. En fait, on dirait qu'il n’a pas du tout envie que Jiwoo et sa famille s’installent ici. Déconcerté mais pas découragé, Jiwoo fait de son mieux pour s'adapter à la vie à la campagne... jusqu'à ce qu'il s'avère que quelqu'un essaie de chasser sa famille d'ici. Jiwoo a des soupçons, mais sera-t-il capable de trouver le vrai coupable ?
description.ko:
귀농한 부모님을 따라 시골 학교로 전학 온 지우. 상쾌한 공기, 여유로운 분위기.. 모두 마음에 들었다. 그러나 기분 좋게 새출발 할 수 있을 것 같았던 것도 잠시,
지우네가 정성껏 가꾼 꽃밭이 엉망이 된 걸 발견하는데..
누군가의 텃세일 거라 생각한 지우는 학교에서 자신에게 유독 까칠했던 동찬을 의심한다.
일단 저 앞머리! 무슨 생각 하는지 알 수 없게 하는 저 앞머리부터 까고 만다!!

description.en:
“Until the day humanity falls.”

In the year 2020, Earth’s magnetic poles disappeared and humankind was nearly wiped out by cosmic radiation. Within the span of a hundred years, living creatures began to mutate and devour each other while the remaining humans, numbering in the tens of thousands, struggled bitterly in their man-made bases.

In the Abyss, home to the mutated xenogenics, there lived a sentient little mushroom. Because it had been nourished by the blood and flesh of the deceased human An Ze, not only did it take on a similar-looking human form, but a similar name as well: An Zhe.

An Zhe is determined to go to the human base to search for his spore, which had been harvested by humans. Once there, however, he faces the omnipresent risk of discovery and certain death as he tries to keep his non-human nature hidden from the Judges, whose responsibility is to inspect for and eliminate xenogenics like himself. And of all the Judges, Colonel Lu Feng is the most perceptive and merciless—as soon as he determines that someone is a xenogenic, he will execute that person on the spot.

But An Zhe’s mutation goes undetected by Lu Feng’s eyes, and so a tale of humans and xenogenics unfolds…

Silver Award winner at the 12th Chinese Nebula Awards for Chinese Science Fiction.
description.pl:
Ponury i niegościnny świat po katastrofie ekologicznej. Spustoszoną ziemię bombarduje promieniowanie kosmiczne. Niedobitki ludzkości schroniły się w dwóch ostatnich ocalałych bazach, desperacko próbując przetrwać. Każdy kontakt z obcym organizmem żywym grozi skażeniem genetycznym.

Do bazy ludzi trafia zagubiony chłopak, który w rzeczywistości nie jest nawet człowiekiem. Los styka go z bezlitosnym sędzią, wyszkolonym do tropienia i likwidowania mutantów. Niespodziewanie ich znajomość przeradza się w coś więcej…

Polskie tłumaczenie powieści dostępne tutaj: https://www.wattpad.com/story/251281478-little-mushroom

description.en: Adriana is a beautiful princess who was called the flower of society and that she was the incarnation of a fairy. Having met a man she loved and dreamed of a happy life with, she was caught up in a conspiracy and lost her family, and faced a miserable death by her husband’s affair partner. She then felt a great sense of freedom that this pain was finally over. She realised that she was back in the past, 8 years ago to be exact. “I can’t repeat that miserable life again!“ In order to uncover the conspiracy surrounding her family's deaths, Adriana hides her identity and sneaks into a bank owned by her family. Will Adriana be able to live happily in this life?

Julia, who was born an orphan, was killed in exchange for falling in love with the Young Master of the Marjoram Family. But when she opened her eyes, at the same location as any other day, she was rescued by the Commander of the Imperial Army, ‘Carus’... She was hit by a curse of being unable to die, and this is now her eighth life. After realizing that she would be stuck in the loop forever if she didn't take down the Marquis, she became a servant within the Palace to utilize the Royal Family’s power to demolish the Marjoram Family in her eighth life. “Isn’t this how we’re supposed to plot revenge?”

In said town lives Hifumi, a middle school boy, who one day encounters a girl who just moved in... Help "correct" the supernatural in this action-packed tale from Yasuki Tanaka, creator of "Summer Time Rendering"!

title.en: Baby Concubine Wants to Live Quietly

altTitles.en: The Baby Concubine Wants to Live Quietly

altTitles.zh: 小嫔妃想要安安静静地生活

description.en:
I possessed a supporting character in a reverse harem novel. A young concubine who, in the end, was driven to death for treason after begging for attention from the regnant empress who was the female lead, and doing wicked things to the male leads who were the concubines. Despite everything, the fortunate thing was that I possessed her right after entering the Imperial Palace. Even if everyone in the Imperial Palace were wary of me, they didn’t hate me yet.

‘Let’s not be impudent, and be obedient.’

I obstinately didn’t need nor have the mindset of trying to be loved by the Empress. Although the male leads who were the concubines were giving me glances, I could just lie flat. Since it wasn’t even a very difficult thing, I really did so. It was definitely like that, but–

“Come to my bedchamber tonight. I’ll read you a fairy tale book!”

“P-please don’t cry. I’ll give you this.”

Just why is everyone’s attitude endlessly gentle? I couldn’t understand. And it was baffling.

‘…I don’t need it though?’

I wasn’t really a young kid lacking affection. And that gaze in which they looked at me as if I were the loveliest in the world was extremely uncomfortable. Just where would I use a fairy tale book that’s full of jewels and silk, and the magic pearl which is the Imperial family’s heirloom? Since it’s already been done, I just wish for everyone to get out of my palace.

---
In the nation of Seora, Yehwa Aryun is the Empress Regnant, and her court is full of consorts with special powers. The newest member of the imperial court is 8-year-old Sanya Yeoran. And although she has no powers, Sanya actually has the mind of an adult who knows exactly what will happen in this fantasy world, because she already read about it in her past life. Thanks to that, she comes up with a plan to avoid her tragic execution: stay away from Yehwa and her jealous consorts at all costs!

description.en: Lady Sharen Tort von Atrina, who was once Nara Lee in South Korea, has transmigrated into the story of *The Empress’s Extravagant Outing*. In this fictional world, she must rewrite her fate and avoid death by helping her cousin, who is also the villainess, Carrel, become a better person. As Sharen begins to make progress in her new life, it seems as if Nara’s soul is calling her back to Korea…

description.en:
Twenty-year-old Jeong Seyun, a rabbit descendant, knows that dragons are considered the chaebols of the beast world. But she'd rather have a relationship based on love than an arranged marriage with a dragon. And as fate would have it, as soon as she enters college, she falls in love with fox descendant Kim Hangyeol at first sight! She musters up the courage to confess, but... to the wrong person?!
Will Seyun's dream of a romance come true? (Summary adapted from Kakaopage.)

description.en:
One day, Son Mo-Ah fell into a dungeon and became a gathering hunter.
Son Mo-Ah, who somehow narrowly escaped death, was going to live a normal life but gets caught up in a dungeon yet again.
In a moment of crisis, she is rescued by Seo Ji-Han, the number one ranker, and succeeds in surviving the situation. Somehow, Son Mo-Ah got entangled in a fateful relationship with said number one ranker.

But he said something really unusual to me.

“Promise me that you will kill all the dungeons bosses in this world, as many as you can.”

What?

description.en:
Sena’s been tossed into another world, as the despised daughter of a noble family. Her little restaurant was her refuge in her last life, so she’s got some tricks up her sleeve—cooking skills! 

As Senianna, she’ll put her brains and fine-tuned taste buds (Korean fried chicken, anyone?) to the test so she can take back the kitchen and gain this society’s esteemed title of Chef Royale. Will her cuisine reign supreme over the empire and bring her the sweet and salty balance of power and affection?

As a chef at a small knight's restaurant, I became the nuisance youngest daughter of a powerful man who was afraid of the emperor. I tried to run away with all my travel expenses…

It’s strange.

“If you say you're sorry, are you that shameless?”
“That’s because I’m your brother.”
“Why don't you take Grandmother on a stroll?”

Why is everyone so nice to me all of a sudden?

“Why do you want to take out someone's eyeballs when they see me?"

People who had caught me trying to escape. I'm just cooking. What's wrong with you?
description.id:
Aku yang dulu hidup dalam penderitaan sewaktu kecil, kini berhasil menjalankan restoran kecil di pinggir jalan dengan guruku yang menjadi orang tua sekaligus teman terbaikku.

Hingga suatu saat, guruku meninggal. Tapi, kemalanganku tidak berhenti di sana. Aku meninggal dan mendapati diriku di dunia lain. Aku kembali hidup sebagai cucu orang paling kuat di wilayah timur?!

Mendapati diriku sebagai Seniana, sekarang aku harus berjuang menjalani hidup dan menjadi royal chef paling hebat!

작은 기사 식당의 요리사였던 나는 황제도 두려워하는 권력가의 천덕꾸러기 막내딸이 되었다.
여비를 저축해 도망치려고 했는데…

이상하다.

"네게 미안하다고 하면 염치가 없는 건가."
"그야 내가 네 오빠니까."
"할애비와 산책해 주지 않는 거냐."

다들 갑자기 왜 잘해 주는 거지?

"너를 보는 놈들의 눈알을 죄 뽑아 버리고 싶은 건 왜일까요."

도망치려는 나와 붙잡는 사람들.

description.en: Sasafune Miyoko, the nurse at a certain high school, is often asked for advice by the students. Almost every day someone comes to ask her about their worries, and this and that… But since these are high school students going through puberty, helping them is usually not that simple! Myō-chan-sensei is hard at work answering questions that are sure to make you blush like "Have you ever had sex outdoors?" or "I wonder which panties my boyfriend likes more".
description.ja:
生徒のためならなんでもシちゃう？熱血ポンコツ教師・みょーちゃん登場☆

とある高校の保健室の先生・笹舟みよかは生徒達の良き相談役として、今日も思春期爆発系質問にカラダを張って答えます！アオカンしたいって彼氏に言われた？ 乳輪が大きいのが悩み？全部みょーちゃん先生にお任せあれ！！！
description.ru: К Сасафунэ Миёко, медсестре одной средней школы, часто обращаются ученики за советом. Почти каждый день кто-нибудь приходит спросить ее о своих проблемах, о том, о сем... Но поскольку речь идет о старшеклассниках, переживающих период полового созревания, помочь им обычно не так-то просто! Мио-тян-сэнсэй усердно отвечает на вопросы, которые наверняка заставят вас покраснеть, например: «Занимались ли вы когда-нибудь сексом на улице?» или «Интересно, какие трусики больше нравятся моему парню?».

description.en: The whole company knew that they they were polar opposites who fought like cats and dogs. Yet during the year-end party, the wall between them shattered after they got drunk! And so the two of them went from always being close to going off on each other to feeling very strange things following the accidental mishap...

altTitles.ja: バトルスタディーズ

description.en:
You can’t win through only with “friendship” and “youth”. We stake our lives to get to Koshien!!  
  
Kanou Shoutarou entered an official baseball club at one of the best powerhouse baseball schools in the country - DL Gakuen. However the discipline in the club, he admired so much, was beyond all imagination!  
  
From Nakibokuro - the former member of PL Gakuen’s baseball club who played at the Koshien as the regular!
4-koma based on the mobile game Guns Girl Z (Houkai Gakuen / Houkai Gakuen 2).

title.en: I Transformed into a Demon God and Became a World-Destroying Beast!

altTitles.zh: 我化身魔神，成为灭世巨兽！

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo Huashen Moshen, Cheng Wei Mie Shi Ju Shou!
Wǒ Huàshēn Móshén, Chéng Wéi Miè Shì Jù Shòu!

description.en: The prosperous city and peaceful society were suddenly destroyed by the outbreak of doomsday. Countless polluted monsters flooded the world, and the forbidden area descended. Billions of people died and the sea of ​​blood surged as the doomsday worlds were connected. At this time, Chen Chu, who had grown silently and was comparable to a god or demon, stood up. And behind him, there was a black monster that was 10,000 meters tall, shaped like Godzilla, but even more ferocious and huge.

altTitles.en: Feast of the Valkyries: ~Cooking with Shirabe~

description.en: An official spinoff of the Senki Zesshou Symphogear series! The divas' next battlefield is a warm gourmet comedy with the chief kitchen maid, Shirabe! Another Symphogear ballad, fresh from the kitchen.

title.en: The S-Class Hunter Doesn't Want to Be a Villainous Princess

altTitles.ko: S급 헌터는 악역 공녀가 되기 싫습니다

altTitles.ko-ro: S-geup Hunter-neun Agyeok Gongnyeoga Doegi Silseumnida

description.en:
"I'm done with romance, so send me home!"

Kim Yi-Young was just an ordinary civil service exam candidate in South Korea.
After studying for more than four and a half years, she finally passed, a truly ordinary person with nothing but reading novels here and there as a hobby.

However, on the day she went out for a celebratory meal after passing the exam, she got into a traffic accident and died, only to find herself reincarnated into the fantasy hunter novel she was reading.

To her, the "System" offered a way back home.
Determined solely to return home and cuddle her warm cat and adorable Maltese, Cerberus, she gained strength through dozens of regressions.

Signing contracts with the constellations of the original work and dying multiple times, she eventually succeeded in conquering the "Tower" of the original work and defeating the owner of the tower on the final floor.

Now, all that's left is to go home......

Or so she thought!

[Due to an error, instead of returning to the original world, we will reincarnate you into the author's new work!]

I don't need that! All I wanted was my sweet home! Is that so difficult?! I even got rid of the Tower!?

Moreover, romance fantasy?! Even in my previous life, I didn't care about romance, not one bit!
And to top it off, I didn't even reincarnate into my own body this time, but into the "villainess" of the book!

I'm not afraid of the threats in this world, but I'm worried about being forced into a romance quest.

"Can I go home...?"
description.ko:
**로맨스는 됐으니까 집에나 보내줘!**
김이영, 그녀는 대한민국의 평범한 공무원 시험 응시생이었다.
그것도 4년 반이 넘는 긴 시간동안 공부 끝에 합격한, 낙이라고는 짬짬이 소설읽는 것밖에 없는 정말 평범한 사람.

그러나 합격을 축하하기 위해 외식을 나간 날 교통사고를 당해 죽고, 자신이 읽던 현태판타지 헌터물에 빙의하고 만다.
그런 이영에게 집으로 돌아갈 수 있는 길을 제안하는 '시스템'.
그녀는 오로지 집에 돌아가서 배 따땃하게 지지고 귀여운 말티즈 켈베로스를 끌어안겠다는 일념 하에 수십 번씩 회귀하며 힘을 길렀다.
원작 속의 성좌들과 계약하고 수차례 죽어가며 원작 속의 '탑'을 공략하여 결국 마지막 층의 지배자, 탑의 주인을 처리하는 데 성공한다. 

이제 남은 건 집으로 가는 것 뿐……,


인줄 알았는데!

[오류로 인해 원래 세상으로의 복귀 대신, 작가의 신작에 빙의시켜드리겠습니다!]

필요 없어! 내가 바란건 내 스윗 홈뿐이었는데!
그게 그렇게 어려워?! 탑도 내가 없애줬는데?!?!

게다가, 로맨스 판타지라니! 이전 빙의에서도 로맨스의 ㄹ도, 아니, ㄹ의 한 획도 신경 안 쓰고 살았는데!
거기에 이전처럼 내 몸으로 책에 빙의한 게 아니라 책 속의 '악녀'에 빙의했다!

이 세계의 위협은 전혀 두렵지 않지만, 로맨스를 강제로 끌어내는 퀘스트는 걱정된다. 

나, 집에 갈 수 있을까……?
description.pt-br:
**Estou farta de romance, então me mandem para casa!**

Kim Yi-Young era apenas uma candidata comum ao exame de serviço civil na Coreia do Sul. Depois de estudar por mais de quatro anos e meio, finalmente passou, uma pessoa verdadeiramente comum que só gostava de ler romances de vez em quando como passatempo.

No entanto, no dia em que saiu para uma refeição comemorativa após passar no exame, sofreu um acidente de trânsito e morreu, apenas para se ver reencarnada no romance de caçadora de fantasia que estava lendo.

Para ela, o "Sistema" ofereceu um caminho de volta para casa. Determinada apenas a voltar para casa e abraçar seu gato e o adorável Maltês, Cerberus, ela ganhou força através de dezenas de regressões. Assinando contratos com as constelações da obra original e morrendo várias vezes, eventualmente conseguiu conquistar a "Torre" da obra original e derrotar o dono da torre no último andar.

Agora, tudo o que resta é voltar para casa......

Ou pelo menos era o que ela pensava!

[Devido a um erro, em vez de retornar ao mundo original, vamos reencarná-la na nova obra do autor!]

Eu não preciso disso! Tudo o que eu queria era minha doce casa! É tão difícil assim?! Até me livrei da Torre!?!?!

Além disso, fantasia romântica?! Nem mesmo na minha vida anterior eu me importava com romance, nem um pouco! E para piorar, nem reencarnei em meu próprio corpo desta vez, mas na "vilã" do livro!

Não tenho medo das ameaças deste mundo, mas estou preocupada em ser forçada a uma busca romântica.

Será que posso voltar para casa......?

altTitles.es-la: Los hombres lobo se vuelven locos por mí

description.en:
A dangerous love affair with a werewolf.
Single mother Olivia finds Damian dying on the streets and takes him home. Before long, the two are sharing a passionate kiss. Damian soon realizes the side effects of the drug suppressing his werewolf instincts vanish when he is with her. Now he must find a way to keep her around, no matter the cost.

I Became the Mother of a Bloody Male Lead
I Became the Mother of the Tragic Male Lead

description.en:
When I opened my eyes, I became Sheriel, the mother of the male protagonist in the novel, A Wasteland Without Blood or Tears. In the original novel, the male lead, Cardicel, was famous for being cruel, so I looked at him with trepidation, thinking he would be different from the beginning, but what was this? My son, who will soon become the lead male protagonist, is so cute.

“We can’t let such a cute child grow up to be a person who imprisons and harms the female lead!”

title.en: Zatsuyou Fuyo Jutsushi ga Jibun no Saikyou ni Kizuku made

altTitles.ja: 雑用付与術師が自分の最強に気付くまで

altTitles.en: Until the Chore-Granting Sorcerer Realized That He Is at His Strongest

description.en:
Wimme Strauss is an adjunct sorcerer who provides support and does odd jobs. However, after defeating the master of the hierarchy, he is expelled from the party by the leader, whose pride is hurt. Wimme is at a loss, but his childhood ~~stalker~~friend Heidemarie finds him and recruits him for the biggest party, the Wings of the Dragon.
"It's like a miracle ...... fuhehe."
He claims that his achievement is a coincidence, but it's only a matter of time before everyone around him realizes what he's capable of.

altTitles.ja: ブサイク令嬢のシークレットポーチ

altTitles.zh: 丑八怪小姐的秘密化妆包

description.en:
When Yunseol wakes up as "Laila el Este" in the novel, “Bird Cage,” she is horrified.

Though Laila may be beautiful, her beauty is the reason the three male leads obsess over her and make her life a living hell. As such, Laila decides to use her professional makeup skills to become high society’s infamous ugly duckling.

But out of nowhere, she receives a marriage proposal from Duke Montefeltra, a fellow outcast who is ostracized for his unattractive looks.

Will this turn of events help Laila escape the novel’s bad ending once and for all?

Chéngwéi Yīncáo Dìfǔ De Zhīpèi Zhě

altTitles.en: Becoming the Ruler of the Underworld

description.en: Your sins of past, present, and future, who can you blame but yourself? In the Court of the Underworld, never have a sinner gone unpunished! And now, you are here~
description.zh: 阳间三世，伤天害理皆由你？阴曹地府，古往今来放过谁！你可来了~

altTitles.ja: 美味しんぼ

description.en:
Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**

altTitles.pt-br: Aulas de luta de primeira classe

description.en:
The bullied loser Kim Jaehyuk receives 'Top 1 Fighting Tutoring'!
Kim Jaehyuk is a high school student who has been living in despair under the torment of bullies. He's good at studying, but he'd rather be good at fighting.
Then, as if by fate, a 'fighting tutor' comes into his life!
description.pt-br: Kim Jaehyuk é um estudante do ensino médio que vive em desespero sob o tormento dos valentões. Ele é bom nos estudos, mas preferiria ser bom na luta. Então, o destino põe um "tutor de luta" em sua vida!

description.en: There was someone who set out after receiving orders from the Absolute One who first unified the continent to learn the secret of immortality. He believed that he would definitely discover the secret of immortality even if he had to travel all over the world. He never returned until the Absolute died and the empire collapsed, leaving behind only numerous speculations and gradually being forgotten in people's memories. And after a long time...
description.ru:
От создателя знаменитой манхвы «Мастер»! 
 
Могучий правитель, объединивший континент, послал своего самого отважного воина на поиски секрета бессмертия. Правитель был уверен, что тайна бессмертия будет раскрыта, даже если придётся искать её по всему миру. Однако... тот так и не вернулся. Правитель скончался. Империя пала. О воине ещё долго говорили, но со временем люди начали забывать и его. И вот, спустя многие годы...

title.en: Uma Musume Pretty Derby: Star Blossom

altTitles.ja: ウマ娘 プリティーダービー スターブロッサム

description.en:
The popular cross-media content "Uma Musume Pretty Derby" features "Uma Musume" who have inherited the names and souls of numerous racehorses! A new legend begins with the indomitable horse girl "Sakura Laurel" as the main character.

---

description.ja: 「挑戦なくして、得られるものなど何もない」　見習いトレーナー・椿が出会ったのは、ガラスの脚を抱えたデビュー前のウマ娘・サクラローレル。半人前の2人が見た頂点への夢は、無謀なのか――。

altTitles.th: รักอลวนคนสลับบ้าน

description.en: Nagi Umino was mistakenly switched at birth, and now attends a prestigious private high school. One day, he has a chance meeting with Erika Amano, an incredibly high society highschool girl who claims she's on the way to meet her fiancé, and who asks/forces him to be her fake boyfriend. Neither of them, at the time, understood the significance of their meeting for Erika was the girl Nagi was switched at birth with, and Nagi was Erika's soon-to-be fiancé! The curtain raises on a romantic comedy of intertwined fates that begins with being switched at birth!
description.es: Una comedia romántica sobre Nagi yendo a una reunión con sus verdaderos padres, y sobre Erika, que está atormentada por un compromiso no deseado!
description.fr: Nagi est un élève sérieux passionné par ses études. Un jour, alors qu'il est en deuxième année, il découvre qu'il a été échangé à la naissance avec une fille. Espérant garder leurs enfants biologiques et adoptifs, leurs parents décident qu'ils vont se fiancer pour pouvoir rester en famille. Mais Nagi est déjà amoureux d'une autre fille...
description.it: Nagi Umino, studente al secondo anno di una prestigiosa scuola preparatoria, ha scoperto di essere un bambino scambiato alla nascita. Un giorno, mentre si sta dirigendo all'incontro con i suoi veri genitori, incontra Erika Amano, una strana ragazza promessa in sposa nonostante la giovane età. Rifiutando di sposarsi, costringe Nagi a far finta di essere il suo ragazzo per cercare di far desistere i genitori dall'idea del matrimonio. Nagi e Erika scopriranno di avere molto più in comune di quanto pensino!
description.ja: 赤ちゃんの頃に取り違えられ、今は名門私立に通う高校 2年の海野凪。ある日、これから許嫁に会いにいくという超お嬢様女子高生・天野エリカと偶然出会い、彼氏のフリをしてくれと半ば強引に頼まれてしまう。だが、その時の二人は知る由もなかった。エリカは凪と取り違えられた子どもで、凪はエリカの許嫁相手だということを……。
description.ru: Романтическая комедия о Наги, идущем на встречу со своими настоящими родителями, и о Эрике, которая мучается из-за нежеланной помолвки!..
description.pt-br: Uma comédia romântica sobre Nagi que está indo se encontrar com seus verdadeiros pais e sobre Erika, que é atormentada por um casamento indesejado!

altTitles.ja: LAB MICE GAME

altTitles.zh: 烈焰挽歌·帕克斯路计划

description.en:
'Hannibal', an organization trying to take over the world. The extreme retaliation against the organization that caused the severe abuse and exploitation of Beckham and his comrades! Beckham, who lived in a poor village in Mumbai, India, and needed to make money for his family, happened to stumble upon a flyer that said that they were looking for children who had special abilities. The organization that spread those flyers was an organization known as a nursery, 'Hannibal'. Beckham showed them his ability to control fire and in return for receiving money for his family, left for England with them. When Beckham arrived at the facility, he met children from all over the world who had special abilities just like him. However, contrary to what Beckham thought would be a way to earn lots of money if he helped with the experiment, he saw children who were filled with fatigue, fear, as well as a sense of resignation. And not long after, Beckham learned the reason why.

---

世界征服を目論む組織「ハンニバル」 彼らに激しい虐待と搾取をされてきた超能力者のビッカムとその仲間たちの大反撃が今始まる…！

description.ko:
세상을 지배하려는 조직 ‘한니발’,
이들에게 극심한 학대와 착취를 당해온 초능력자 빅캄과 그 동료들의 대반격!

인도 뭄바이의 한 빈민촌, 가족들의 생활비가 필요했던 ‘빅캄’은 우연히 특수한 능력 을 지닌 아이들을 찾는다는 전단지를 발견한다. 전단지를 뿌린 단체는 보육시설로 알 려져 있던 ‘한니발’. ‘빅캄’은 그들에게 자신의 ‘불을 다루는 능력’을 보여주고, 가족들의 생활비를 받는 대신 그들과 함께 영국으로 떠난다. 영국의 한 시설에 도착한 ‘빅캄’ 은 그 곳에서 자신처럼 특수한 능력을 지닌 세계 각지의 아이들을 만난다. 그런데, 실험을 도와주면 많은 돈을 벌 수 있을 거라 생각한 ‘빅캄’과 달리 아이들은 불안과 공포, 그리고 체념의 기색을 보인다. 그리고 오래지 않아 ‘빅캄’은 그 이유를 알게 된다.

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/9810/)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/81130)

来自贫民窟的火焰操控者卡姆被以给家人提供生活费得条件骗到了实验基地，发现这里在针对超能力者们进行着人体实验。得知这一切的“卡姆”对“乔治”产生了极大的复仇心理，并开始计划从中逃离……

The Beast Tamed by the Evil Woman

altTitles.ar: الوحش المروض من قبل المرأة الشريرة

altTitles.ja: 悪女が手懐けた獣

description.ar:
ا عندما يخرج الشرير الحقيقي الوحيد في الرواية أخذ رجلًا جميلًا وتم ترويضه لبقية حياته. بعد أن دفع مخاوفه إلى أقصى حد ، تعلم كيف يتوسل منها ، ليصبح وحشًا لا يمكنه الهروب أبدًا ، حتى لو تم فك رباطه. ومع ذلك ، يقع الوحش في حب المرأة التي تنقذه ، ويصبح الإمبراطور بجانبه ، ويعاقب الشرير بالقيود الأبدية. بعد القصة ، استولت على جسد الشرير في ذلك الوقت عندما كانت في منتصف الطريق لترويض الرجل الرئيسي. ……ماذا علي أن أفعل؟ أولا ، دعونا نتراجع عن غسيل المخ شيئا فشيئا. وبعد ذلك ... دعونا نتظاهر بأننا قد تبنا. "لقد مررت بالكثير من المتاعب في البحث عنك." "أنا ... لا أفهم تمامًا ما تقصده يا جلالة الملك." "كيف أنسى لمستك؟" أمسك بمعصمي ، وأمسك بيدي وحركها برفق على خده - تمامًا مثلما فعلت إليانا ، الشريرة في الرواية ، دائمًا عندما تمدحه. "سأروّضك ، مثلما فعلت - وحشًا لا يمكنه فعل أي شيء بدوني." غطت كفي على خده ثم شفتيه. وضع عليها قبلة قصيرة قبل أن يسحب يدي ببطء

---

description.en:
The only real villain in the novel, took a handsome man and tamed him for the rest of his life. After putting his fear to the limit, he learned to plead with her, becoming a beast from which he could never escape even if he loosened his leash. However, one day, the beast falls in love and becomes emperor with the woman who saved him, and plunges the evil woman into an eternal bondage.

---
I've posessed the body of the sociopathic villainess, Illyana! An evil villainess who picks up a boy named Magnus and raises him however she pleases... that Illyana is me?!

"I am going to tame you into a beast that cannot do anything without me. Just as you had done to me."

And after 2 years, he who had become an emperor began his revenge. Excuse me, author! Illyana was the sinner but why must I suffer his vengeance? I was just a normal reader named Yuna!

description.fr:
Iliana, la maléfique méchante d'un roman recueille un beau garçon qu'elle dompte comme une bête. À l'aide de drogues et de lavage de cerveau, L'homme laisse peu à peu place à la bête jusqu'à ce que l'héroïne le sauve. La bête deviendra l'empereur du pays et punira la méchante pour l'éternité. C'est une histoire qui aurait pu m'amuser si je n'avais pas été transportée dans le corps de la méchante au beau milieu du roman. Que faire de cette bête rampant à mes pieds? description.uk:
Єдина справжня лиходійка у романі взяла красеня і приборкала його назавжди. 
Дійшовши межі та ставши звіром, він навчився благати її. Від сутності його неможливо втекти навіть якщо розірвати повідець. Та це триває тільки доти, поки він не стає імператором, закохується в рятівницю та занурює лиходійку у вічне рабство. 
Я потрапила у ту частину, де головний герой ще не приборканий повністю. 
Що робити? Спочатку приборкати його повністю, а потім покаятись? 
«Це важко забути».
«Що ви маєте на увазі… Я не знаю, Ваша Величносте Імператор».
«Як я можу забути цей твій дотик?»
Він схопив мене за руку, підніс її до щоки й обережно потерся.
Так само, як завжди робила лиходійка у романі, коли хвалила його.
«Я приборкаю тебе. Як ти зробила зі мною, звіром, який без тебе нічого не може зробити».
Долоня, що так ненавмисно торкнулася його щоки, досягла губ. Він коротко поцілував долоню, потім повільно прибрав руку...

---

description.en:
Rose falls asleep at home and nearly faints when she wakes up at the palace in the arms of Emperor Lukewarell. Despite her uncanny resemblance to his beloved concubine, Agnes, Rose manages to convince Lukewarell that she is an ordinary tutor with no relation.

However, she must help him find the missing Agnes by masquerading as the concubine and feeling out the suspicious people around her. But the more Rose learns about Agnes complicated relationships, the less she understands who this mysterious woman was. In fact, the dread in her heart only grows as she gets closer to the truth...

He fiercely refused rules in his new life and embraced the sword, cutting out the future and rewriting his fate with it! It also allows him to ride the game before it is integrated into reality!

Yoi is a girl who is called "prince" by those around her and treated like a hero in a girls' manga.
Then she meets Ichimura, who is also called "prince." He calls her "beautiful" and saves her from getting tangled up with a drunk at a convenience store, and the two quickly get close!
Is this encounter fate? Or is it bad luck?!
The story of a man and a woman, both called "princes," begins now!

description.en:
"Gloriosa... You ugly thing that can't even bloom a single petal, you'd make perfect food for the trees-."

I was one of thirty-seven children of the Elvador family of the Flower People, and I was sacrificed to the tree that was the foundation of my family. Then, with the help of my betrothed, Arvid, my family was destroyed and I was only saved by my death.

When I woke up, I was transported back in time...? Do I have to relive my horrible past all over again? I wasn’t even saved by dying?! ...If I have to start all over again, I'll save myself in this life-! This is Gloriosa's intense and endearing redemption.

---
Gloriosa Elvador can bloom flowers that produce harmless flames, but her evil brother, Magnus, deems her power worthless and feeds her to the sacred tree. Although she's resigned to die, she reawakens in the past as her 13-year-old self with a second chance at life. Now, she must find her cursed betrothed, Arvid Yultecia. Only he can save her from dying again, and only she can lift his curse. Will their blooming love be enough to save them both, or will Magnus trample their budding romance?

description.en:
I lived without a home or family and suffered until I died, but then an 'angel' appeared and made me an offer.

"You, a professional reader of rofan novels, would you like to be reincarnated into a world created based on rofan?"

Because he said that my (handsome) Dad and my (handsome) older brothers will fed me with a diamond spoon, I was reborn...

—They say I might be a child born from my mother's affair?

As soon as I was born, I was handed over to my relatives and became a servant, facing abuse.

"At this rate, I might freeze to death or starve to death alone."

There's nothing I can do about this situation.

"Daddy, take me away—!"

Let's find a way to survive somehow.
But...

[You have fulfilled the conditions.]
[The trait <Rush and Cash> has awakened.]

[Dear reader, do not hesitate to use any means and methods to obtain what you desire. Conquer and seize it!
Romance novel readers don't back down in situations like this!
Show your abilities!
-Condition: Persuade the Duke of Pheraton and obtain the <Summoning Medium>.
-Reward: 5,000 cash draw ticket.
-Quest rejection penalty: Game over in life.
-Quest failure penalty: Game over in life.]

"So, the quest is to kiss my Dad on the cheek?"

...I've been scammed.
description.es-la: Viví sufriendo sin hogar, sin religión, sin padres, pero apareció un ángel y me reencarnó. “Tú, una profesional en lo que respecta a las novelas de fantasía romántica, ¿te gustaría reencarnar en un mundo creado a partir de una novela de fantasía romántica?” Reencarné porque dijo que tendría un padre (guapo) y un hermano mayor (guapo) que me daría de comer con una cuchara e incluso me regalaría una mina de diamantes, pero... -¿Podría ser una niña de la aventura de mi madre? Tan pronto como nací, me enviaron a la casa de mi madre y caí en una familia que me priva. "¡Si me quedo así, podría terminar congelándome o muriéndome de hambre!"

title.en: The Gangster Baby of the Duke's Family

altTitles.pt-br: A Bebê Gangster da Família do Duque

description.en:
My name is Leonora Hachania. Although I’m the daughter of a villain extra whose name in itself means ‘insignificant’, my desire for power is unimaginable. I can’t just let the Hachania family be as insignificant as it is in the original novel! 

“Woll to the left, wight now!” 
“Yes, ma’am!” 
“Woll to the wight, wight now!” 
“Yes, ma’am!” 

With the sunglasses I made by painting on them with ink, I raised my voice fiercely. 

“Sowldier Enoch, we don’t cwy!” The tender-hearted third child who had met my eyes was startled and sniffled with his runny nose. 

“W-we don’t cry!” I’ve succeeded. 
“Were you originally this weak? How annoying.” 
“Ugh! S-Save me!” 
“Hyung, they look like they’re really suffering, should we kill them quickly? It would be better for them.” 

My brothers who couldn’t even hold a candle to the male lead and were extras have become the greatest villain brothers in the world! 

Although it was a bit difficult since my villain father was so clumsy, “Rini, just what kind of evil deed are you planning this time…”
“Keke, it’s nothing. As expected of my daughter, you’re planning something evil. Very nice.”

I’ve redesigned him to be a villain with a dual personality. Keke, mwahaha! Nice, I’ve increased our assets using the information from the original novel and made the family into a significant one! Now, I just need to escape this terminally ill body and enjoy the proper life of a villainess- 

“I know that Your Ladyship is a caring person, so it would be too greedy to wish for your kindness to be mine alone.” 

I think the human weapon that I revived for the family has broken.

“But if I get rid of all the people you are kind to…” The red flame blazing in his hand burned the map of the world. “Won’t I be the only you can be kind to?” He says that as if he’s about to hunt down the entire world.
description.ko:
내 이름은 레오노라 하차니아.
이름부터 하찮은 엑스트라 악당의 딸이지만 권력욕이 대단하죠.

하차니아 가문을 원작처럼 하찮게 둘 수 없어!

“좌로 구름미다, 씰씨!”
“실시!”
“우로 구름미다, 씰씨!”
“실시!”

잉크를 칠해 만든 선글라스를 뽐내며 나는 바락바락 목청을 높였다.

“에노끄 훈뇬병, 울지 안씀미다!”

나와 눈이 마주친 마음 약한 셋째가 찔끔 놀라 삐죽 나온 콧물을 들이켠다.

“우, 울지 않습니다!”

* * *

성공했다.

“원래 이렇게 약했던 건가? 쓰레기같군.”
“크억! 사, 살려줘!”
“형, 괴로워보이니까 빨리 죽이는 건 어떨까? 그게 저 사람에게는 더 좋은 일일 거야.”

남주 콧김에도 날아가는 촛불 엑스트라였던 오빠들이 세계관 최고 악당 형제가 되었다!

어설픈 악당 아빠가 살짝 난관이었지만,

“리니, 또 무슨 악독한 짓을 계획하고 있는 것이냐…….”
“쿠쿡, 아니다. 내 딸다운 못된 짓을 계획하고 있는거로군. 아주 좋다.”

이중인격 빌런으로 개조시켰다.

쿠쿡. 움화화!

좋아. 원작 정보를 이용해 재산도 불렸겠다, 가문도 하찮지 않게 만들었겠다!
빨리 시한부 육체를 탈피해 제대로된 빌런의 삶을 즐겨 보려고 했는데-

“공녀가 다정한 사람이라는 거, 알고 있습니다. 그러니 내게만 상냥하길 바라는 건 욕심이겠죠.”

아무래도 가문을 위해 부활시킨 인간 병기가 조금 고장 난 것 같다.

“하지만 상냥해질 대상이 없어지면…….”

그의 손에서 피어오른 새빨간 불꽃이 세계 지도를 불태웠다.

“나에게만 상냥해질 수도 있지 않을까요?”

마치 세계 전체를 잡아먹을 듯이.
description.pt-br:
Meu nome é Leonora Khachania. Ela é filha de um vilão extra menor, mas tem um grande desejo de poder.

Não podemos deixar o Haagenia tão insignificante quanto o original!

"Esquerda, Cloudy, foca!"

"Faça!"

"Direita, Cloudy!"

"Faça!"

Exibindo um óculos de sol feito com tinta, levantei minha voz.

"ENOQUE, chore!"

A terceira criança, que tinha um contato visual fraco comigo, ficou surpresa e engoliu o choro.

"Woo, eu não vou chorar!"

* * *

Sucesso.

"Era para ser tão fraco? É como lixo."

"Gasp! M-me salve!"

"Irmão, por que você não o mata rapidamente, porque isso parece ser o melhor para ele."

Os irmãos mais velhos, que eram extras frouxos, se tornaram os melhores irmãos vilões do mundo!

O desajeitado pai vilão foi um desafio.

"Lini, o que mais você está planejando fazer..."

"Haha, não importa. Você está planejando algo maldoso como minha filha. Muito bem."

Foi convertido em um vilão de dupla personalidade.

Kekeke. Mwahaha.

Boa. Você deve ter usado as informações originais para aumentar sua riqueza e tornar sua família insignificante! Tentei escapar do limite de tempo e aproveitar a vida de um verdadeiro vilão—

"Eu sei que uma princesa é uma pessoa amigável. Então é ganância querer que você seja doce apenas comigo."

Acho que a arma humana revivida para a família está um pouco quebrada.

"Mas quando não há ninguém para ser gentil..."

A chama vermelha brilhante de sua mão queimou o mapa-múndi.

"Eu acho que você pode ser gentil comigo?"

altTitles.en: I'm Not Doing This With a Friend

description.en:
Rien is a transfer student at Arena Academy who wants a peaceful life. The successor of the Lisianthus Duchy fell in love at first sight with her.

Carlson, who has the face of an innocent man, is a genius in magic, who excels in both looks and family background. He only has one flaw.; he always beats up anything that irritates him.

"I like kind men."

Rien's determination with such words, Carlson's gentle face, and even the thought that this relationship will end once they graduate all clouded her mind. However, Rien still can't help but feel attracted to Carlson.

Can this friendship proceed smoothly?
description.ko:
아레나 아카데미의 편입생 리엔.
평온한 아카데미 생활을 바라던 그녀에게 리시안셔스 공작가의 후계자가 첫눈에 반해버렸다.

용모 우수, 집안 우수, 마법 천재이자 순애보인 카르시온에게 부족한 단 하나,
거슬리는 건 모두 박살내는 '인성'!

"난 착한 애가 좋더라."

그 한마디로 리엔 한정 순한 얼굴이 된 카르시온과
언젠가 졸업하고 나면 잊어버릴 인연이라고 생각하면서도
속절없이 카르시온에게 이끌리는 리엔.

이 우정, 과연 순조롭게 이어질 수 있을까?

description.en:
I reincarnated as the "Villainess Eumiella" from an RPG Otome game. In the main story, Eumiella is merely a side character, but after the ending, she re-enters the story as the Hidden Boss, a character boasting high stats on par with the heroes! 

Lighting a fire in my gamer's soul, and taking advantage of being left on my own in my parent's territory, I trained, trained, and trained! As a result of my training… by the time I enrolled in the academy, I managed to reach level 99. 

Though I had planned to live out my days as inconspicuously and peacefully as possible, soon after entering the school, I'm suspected by the Heroine and Love Interests of being the "Demon Lord"…?  
  
Based on a popular web novel of seeking a peaceful life, a fantasy story of the strongest villainess!
description.id:
Aku bereinkarnasi menjadi antagonis "Dolkness Eumelia" dari gim otome RPG. Di cerita utamanya, Eumelia hanyalah seorang karakter sampingan, tapi setelah ending, ia memasuki cerita lagi dengan menjadi bos rahasia, menjadi karakter yang mempunyai status lebih tinggi daripada pahlawan!!  
  
Memantik jiwa gamer-ku, lalu mengambil kesempatan karena ditinggal oleh keluargaku di wilayah mereka, aku berlatih! Berlatih! Lalu pada akhir pelatihanku saat aku baru memasuki akademi, ternyata levelku mencapai 99.  
  
Walaupun aku sudah membuat rencana untuk hidup tanpa mencolok dan damai, beberapa saat setelah masuk sekolah, aku disangka "Raja Iblis" oleh si Heroine dan Para Target Cintanya …?  
  
Diangkat dari Web Novel yang populer yang mencari kehidupan damai, sebuah cerita fantasi tentang antagonis terkuat!
description.vi: Yumiera Dorkness là con gái của một Bá tước, bị mọi người và cả chính cha mẹ mình ghẻ lạnh chỉ vì màu tóc, nguyên nhân là do Ma Vương tóc cũng màu đen giống hệt cô. Một hôm cô chợt nhớ ra được kí ức kiếp trước và cô đã trọng sinh vào một Otome game, cô không trọng sinh vào nữ chính mà lại là nữ phụ phản diện – người mà sau này trở thành trùm cuối của game!? Đây chính là một cuộc hành trình kể về một cô gái chống lại số phận nghiệt ngã, sống một cuộc đời yên bình và tránh trở thành trùm cuối để rồi dính bad end!

description.en:
Kim Roksu has one life motto: “Let’s not get beat up.”

But after dozing off somewhere midway through the novel “Birth of a Hero,” he wakes up as Cale Henituse - one of the minor villains in the novel who gets the beating of a lifetime from soon-to-be hero Choi Han.

Only time will tell how much longer he has before that dreadful encounter. Can Kim Roksu change the course of this story so he can enjoy a long and lavish life free of the soon-to-be hero?

---

description.fr: Réincarné dans un roman, c’est le rêve non? Pas tout à fait, surtout quand on est devenu une ordure qui se fait tabasser par le héros au début de l’histoire… Vu qu’il sait ce qui va se passer, pas question de se faire taper dessus! Et puis, si au passage il peut en profiter pour se la couler douce…
description.id:
Saat membuka mata, aku sudah berada di dalam dunia novel.
Tidak hanya itu, aku masuk ke dalam tubuh seorang tuan muda dari keluarga Count yang terkenal sebagai pembuat onar.
Tetapi, aku tidak bisa menjadi seorang pembuat onar begitu saja kan?
description.it: Quando Kim aprì gli occhi non poteva credere a ciò che stava vedendo. Si era ritrovato inspiegabilmente all’interno di un libro che stava leggendo. Ora lui è Cale Henituse, un antagonista del racconto. Il problema più grande però, è che lui non aveva finito di leggere il libro. Quindi ora lui vive il suo personaggio e gli eventi della storia per come se li ricorda. Ma cosa dovrà fare Cale Henituse una volta superato il punto dove Kim si era fermato?
description.ja:
目を開けると、そこは小説の中だった。 暴君として名高い伯爵家の令息の体に憑依してしまい…!?

description.ko:
눈을 떠보니 소설 속이었다.
그컷도 망나니로 유명한 백작가의 도련님 몸으로.......
그리고, 소설 속에서 나를 박살 냈던 
막강한 주인공 최한이 곧 여기로 온다.
description.pl:
Gdy otworzyłem oczy, znalazłem się w świecie z powieści „Narodziny bohatera”.

Książka ta opisuje przygody Choi Hana - licealisty, który przeniósł się z Ziemi do innego świata - oraz wielu innych bohaterów. Ja znalazłem się w ciele śmiecia z hrabskiej rodziny, na której to terytorium położona jest wioska, w której mieszka Choi Han.

Po tym, jak wioska zostaje zaatakowana przez tajemniczych napastników, główny bohater powiadamia o zdarzeniu syna hrabiego, lecz ten go zbywa.
Następnie ów syn zostaje zbity na kwaśne jabłko.

„To… dość problematyczne.”
description.ru:
Я очнулся в романе, в теле молодого наследника графства, прославленного не без помощи его жестокого выродка.  
Но я не собираюсь быть таким же ублюдком.
description.th:
เมื่อ 'คิมรกซู' ต้องไปอยู่ในร่างอันธพาลตัวร้ายในเรื่องอย่าง 'เคล'
เขาจึงตั้งปณิธานกับตัวเองว่าจะต้องมีชีวิตรอด ไม่ถูก 'ชเวฮัน' ตัวเอกของเรื่อง อัดจนเละเหมือนในนิยาย
และเคลยังตัองร่วมเดินทางผจญภัยไปกับตัวละครในเรื่อง 'กำเนิดวีรชน'
เขาจะมีชีวิตรอด ไม่เจ็บป่วย และใช้ชีวิตได้สงบสุขอย่างที่ต้องการหรือไม่

description.uk:
Коли я відкрив очі, я опинився в новелі.

[Народження героя] - новела, присвячений пригодам головного героя Чхве Хана, хлопчика старшої школи, якого перенесли в інший вимір із Землі, і який народжений як один з численних героїв континенту .
Я став частиною цього роману як старший син графа, сім'я, якого контролювала територію, де знаходиться перше село, яке відвідує Чхве Хань.

Чхве Хан змінюєть після того села, а після — всі її мешканці буди вбиті таємною організацією.

Більшою проблемою є той факт, що цей нікчемний покидьок, яким я став, не знає про те, що трапилося в селі, і насміхається над Чхве Ханом, лише щоб його побили.

"... Це стане проблемою"

Я відчуваю, що зі мною станеться щось серйозне.

Але варто спробувати зробити своє нове життя кращим.
description.zh: 一个出场5秒就下线的贵族混混，一个高冷霸气的英雄男主，穿成前者还马上要被高冷男主暴揍怎么办？呵，作为一个美貌废物，当然只能靠骚操作，抱大腿抢机遇努力在这个充斥着魔法，龙，狼族的大陆求生存！
description.pt-br: “Não posso continuar sendo um lixo pra sempre.” Após ler os 5 primeiros volumes da novel [O Nascimento de um Herói], Kim Rok-Soo dorme e acorda em outro mundo. Ele havia sido transportado para o mundo da novel no corpo de Cale Henituse, o lixo da família do conde Henituse e um nobre mimado que tinha sido espancado pelo protagonista no começo da história. Neste novo mundo cheio de perigo e magia, Cale Henituse (Kim Rok-Soo) deseja apenas viver uma vida tranquila e livre de problemas, mas as coisas nem sempre vão de acordo com o planejado…
description.zh-hk:
睜開眼就發現自己到了小說世界，
而且我還變成了赫赫有名的伯爵家混混少爺...
另外，小說裡那個
把我當成沙包揍的強大主角——崔漢，
很快就要抵達這裡了。
